Trns holiday commemorates an event in the life os the blessed Apostle Saint John which is mentioned by Eusebius, Tertullian ands. Jerom. In the second persecution of the Christians under Domitian, in the year 95, S. John was brought from Ephesus to Rome, and by the orders of the tyrant was thrown into a caldron of boiling oil.
